trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a StopStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: StopStoryboard 작업을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>를 대화형으로 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 중지</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: StopStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).

Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: 스토리 보드 트리거 중지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>이벤트 하지 않고는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 예에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or StopStoryboard) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지, 다시 시작, 중지 또는 스토리 보드에 대화형으로 수 일시 중지, 제어 그렇지 않으면 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>사용 및는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 StopStoryboard) 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 참조 하 여 제어 하</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>으로 시작한 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"></xref> class.
